description:
The job search occurs in a series of stages. The search leads to applying for the job. This then leads to interviewing and eventually the job offer. To be successful in the job search you need to be successful in each phase.

The resume is the marketing tool that shows your skills and qualifications for the job. It is crafted in a way to make you stand out from other candidates. It is what drives interest into inviting you for the next stage: the job interview

The job interview is a meeting between two parties. One is seeking an individual to fulfill a certain role in that organization. The other strives to show they have the skills and knowledge to meet that need. Questions may be asked to measure the response of the job seeker and observe how they answer.A candidate that handles the job interview well shows their potential.

This course teaches how to find success in the job search by understanding the job search process. With this course you will learn to:

  • Gain confidence for the job search by being prepared.
  • Know what to expect with the questions that are asked.
  • Effectively communicate what you offer a potential employer.

The goal of the job search is acceptance and an offer of employment. This course can help you reach that goal.
title: The Job Search Blueprint: How To Master Your Job Search
